attributes.action: abolish non domestic rates on vacant properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On Aprl 1st 2008, the Government abolished the relief available on non-domestic rates payable on vacant commercial buildings. With the current financial crisis it would be of enormous help to every small business that this relief be re-introduced as before, i.e. 100% relief on buildings vacant upto 6 months and 50% relief therefater.
